lyrics:
6 contributorsfebruary snow lyricsverse 1
your eyes glowed like candles in the night
as you wiped the freezin tears from your eyes
i said you still love me you said i dont know
left me standing in the february snow

verse 2
we were the couple others strive to be
now youre just you and im just me
i meant every single word i said
just not the ones that got us in the end

chorus
cause i really wish that youd come back
i just cant do this on my own
cause every time i close my eyes
im underneath that street light in the cold
as you fade into that february snow

verse 3
and every night i sleep i dream of you
but i guess sometimes some dreams dont come true
i gave up on counting sheep i just stare at the door til i fall asleep
and i pray that one day you might come through

chorus
cause i really wish that youd come back
i just cant do this on my own
cause every time i close my eyes
im underneath that street light in the cold
as you fade into that february snow
see flatland cavalry liveget tickets as low as 32you might also likechorus
cause i really wish that youd come back
i just cant do this on my own
cause every time i close my eyes
im underneath that street light in the cold
as you fade into
well as you fade into
that february snow
and damn that february snowembed
